title: Farmers concerned about ‘forever chemicals’ found in wastewater sludge
summary: Farmers across the US are discovering PFAS contamination on their land after spreading sewage sludge as fertilizer. While the EPA promotes the use of sludge, many farmers and environmental groups are calling for regulations and protections against this harmful practice.
